ISSUE.TITLE: TypeError when running a command on a host in a smart inventory
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When a user accesses the hosts tab of a smart inventory, selects the host, and clicks Run Command, a type error occurs: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63685497/151060638-1badb545-ad13-456d-93b2-f888abde28ba.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63685497/151060666-9825f1f3-979c-468f-93c0-3133bd1dc978.png) To be considered- does it make sense to have the Run Command button on this screen?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #11746 from AlexSCorey/11744-fixValidatorBug Fixes validator console error, and routing issue in Instance Groups Branch
